longInfo:
Passport required. 
- Passports and/or passport replacing documents must be valid
  for at least 6 months from date of arrival. 

Visa Issuance:
Visa required, except for Nationals of Jamaica can obtain a
visa on arrival, for a max. stay of 1 month, provided holding
confirmed return/onward tickets.
Additional Information:
- Visitors are required to hold proof of sufficient funds to
  cover their stay and documents required for their next
  destination
